import React, { Component } from 'react' import { Button,Row,Col,Form } from 'react-bootstrap' import {Link} from 'react-router-dom' export class SignupClass extends Component { state={ name:'', phone:'', password:'', confirmPassword:'', } onChangeHandler=(e)=>{ console.log( this.setState({ [ e.target.name]:e.target.value }) ) } render() { const {name,phone,password,confirmPassword} =this.state return ( <>
